paragraphs.body: This looks like a new episode infobox to me, and seemingly it works. I like it better than the outdated, ancient ones we have at the moment. Shall we implement? The 888th Avatar (Talk) 11:50, 19 February 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Is this good enough to be made into a page?  There's one more thing I would like to add- an image of Aang using Seismic Sense to end the battle with Ozai during Sozin's Comet.  Does the image exist on Avatar Wiki, or do I have to upload it myself?Tophvision 02:18, 30 May 2009 (UTC)
